definition: to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be

sentences.english: The market situation and the future development trend of ethnic hair care products are related.
sentences.chinese: 论述了有色人种护发品市场的现状及未来发展趋势。

sentences.english: This raises the question of whether the beneficial results of warfarin can be extrapolated to persons of colour.
sentences.chinese: 这引发疑问，华法林的治疗获益能否外推到有色人种？

sentences.english: The NAACP is hoping to finally lay the N-Word to rest.
sentences.chinese: 美国全国有色人种协进会希望“N”字最终停止使用。

sentences.english: They had a two-room house in a township.
sentences.chinese: 在有色人种居住区有套二室的房子。

sentences.english: Colored people constitute a majority of the population in Western Cape.
sentences.chinese: 西海角省的大部分居民是有色人种。

sentences.english: The National Association for the Advancement of Colored People (NAACP) helped families fight racial segregation laws.
sentences.chinese: 全国有色人种促进协会协助家属们对抗种族隔离法。

sentences.english: Many coloured people live in the slum near the Main Street.
sentences.chinese: 梅因街附近的贫民窟里住着许多有色人种居民。

sentences.english: The second chapter discussed Coetzee's complicated feelings towards the nonwhite.
sentences.chinese: 库切对黑人和有色人种的复杂情感。

sentences.english: The dikes of imperial snobbery hold back a raging sea of color .
sentences.chinese: 势利的英帝国堤坝阻挡着狂怒的有色人种的海洋。

definition: ethnic Chinese/non-Chinese citizen of Chinese ancestry
